## ForceElementSizeOptions interface

An object describing customization for the force body feature.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ForceElementSizeOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [forceHeight](./webshell.forceelementsizeoptions.forceheight.md) | boolean | Force body width to <code>heightValue</code>. |
|  [forceWidth](./webshell.forceelementsizeoptions.forcewidth.md) | boolean | Force body width to <code>widthValue</code>. |
|  [heightValue](./webshell.forceelementsizeoptions.heightvalue.md) | number \| string | The height to override. |
|  [shouldThrowWhenNotFound](./webshell.forceelementsizeoptions.shouldthrowwhennotfound.md) | boolean | When no element is found matching the target, should the script raise an error? |
|  [target](./webshell.forceelementsizeoptions.target.md) | DOMElementRequest | The element to target. |
|  [widthValue](./webshell.forceelementsizeoptions.widthvalue.md) | number \| string | The width to override. |
